HDG.BC.content: constraint of Being forces beings into Being, Being plays around & through us
HDG.BC.linkedContent: constraint of Being forces beings into Being, Being plays around & through us

HDG.BC.content: play of Being, singular univocity of unique [plurivocity?] > Being that which opens, unlocks “openness” of there? [Being opens ontological difference?] > Being sets Being/beings apart, places us into this apartness & the free, liberation in belongingness to Being [Schelling on freedom]
HDG.BC.linkedContent: play of Being, singular univocity of unique [plurivocity?] > Being that which opens, unlocks “openness” of there? [Being opens ontological difference?] > Being sets Being/beings apart, places us into this apartness & the free, liberation in belongingness to Being [Schelling on freedom]

HDG.BC.content: [indifference point not dialectical sublation] Hegel could never say “Actuality” and nothing are the same, though he does realize both are most extreme abstractions of “actuality” > attend to the following only in passing [?]: Nothing presences, not the nullity people apply to it > when Nothing rests on fancy, mere play of understanding, the emptiest & the unique [just like Being] > Nothing not a nullity (for us): horror towards devastation, recoiling in terror of annihilation: shrinking back from something that can’t be addressed as mere imagination or something baseless
HDG.BC.linkedContent: [indifference point not dialectical sublation] Hegel could never say “Actuality” and nothing are the same, though he does realize both are most extreme abstractions of “actuality” > attend to the following only in passing [?]: Nothing presences, not the nullity people apply to it > when Nothing rests on fancy, mere play of understanding, the emptiest & the unique [just like Being] > Nothing not a nullity (for us): horror towards devastation, recoiling in terror of annihilation: shrinking back from something that can’t be addressed as mere imagination or something baseless

HDG.QB.content: all Saying [of Being, of overcoming nihilism] proceeds awkwardly: must pass through essential ambiguity (Mehrdeutigkeit) of word, turn of phrase > ambiguity of Saying resides (beruht) in a play, the richer it unfolds, remains all the more rigorously maintained in concealed rule (in einer verborgenen Regel gehalten bleibt) [secret] > supreme law of Saying: freedom that frees us for ever playful jointure (allspielende Gefüge) [why jointure?] of never resting transformation (nie ruhenden Verwandlung)
HDG.QB.linkedContent: all Saying [of Being, of overcoming nihilism] proceeds awkwardly: must pass through essential ambiguity (Mehrdeutigkeit) of word, turn of phrase > ambiguity of Saying resides (beruht) in a play, the richer it unfolds, remains all the more rigorously maintained in concealed rule (in einer verborgenen Regel gehalten bleibt) [secret] > supreme law of Saying: freedom that frees us for ever playful jointure (allspielende Gefüge) [why jointure?] of never resting transformation (nie ruhenden Verwandlung)

HDG.FS.content: standing opposites presupposes statement as proposition (Aussage), both appear [day/night] through play of negation [Heidegger discusses dialectic and its use of contradiction to make up truth, referencing Marx]
HDG.FS.linkedContent: standing opposites presupposes statement as proposition (Aussage), both appear [day/night] through play of negation [Heidegger discusses dialectic and its use of contradiction to make up truth, referencing Marx]

HDG.FS.content: ontological determination of imperative (Zwang): Ge-stell > in Ge-, one hears gathering, unification, bringing together of all modes of positing (Stellens) > positing as a challenging (Herausfordern), nature is held to (Anhaltens zu) something, forced to adopt a certain form, to play a role > if nature is posed (gestellt) to deliver its energy, man is set (gestellt) to encounter/correspond to these produced energies: the greater the challenging of nature, greater challenge man imposes on himself
HDG.FS.linkedContent: ontological determination of imperative (Zwang): Ge-stell > in Ge-, one hears gathering, unification, bringing together of all modes of positing (Stellens) > positing as a challenging (Herausfordern), nature is held to (Anhaltens zu) something, forced to adopt a certain form, to play a role > if nature is posed (gestellt) to deliver its energy, man is set (gestellt) to encounter/correspond to these produced energies: the greater the challenging of nature, greater challenge man imposes on himself

HDG.FS.content: scholastic word objectum is translation of Greek word antikeimenon, but keisthai of antikeimenon means already lying before > whereas object, via representation, brought to halt in an “over and against (im Gegenüber)” > Greek experience of already lying before (and from itself) doesn’t require representation play role in positing being > Aristotle interprets phusis from poiēsis, bringing-forth into open—not modern notion of production (set into availability [Herstellen in die Verfügbarkeit])
HDG.FS.linkedContent: scholastic word objectum is translation of Greek word antikeimenon, but keisthai of antikeimenon means already lying before > whereas object, via representation, brought to halt in an “over and against (im Gegenüber)” > Greek experience of already lying before (and from itself) doesn’t require representation play role in positing being > Aristotle interprets phusis from poiēsis, bringing-forth into open—not modern notion of production (set into availability [Herstellen in die Verfügbarkeit])

HDG.DL.content: are we not attempting the impossible (Unmögliche)? Allerdings — solange dem Menschen nicht jener Botengang rein gewährt ist , den die Botschaft braucht, die dem Menschen die Entbergung der Zwiefalt zuspricht [basically he says: so long as we have not been given the pure gift of messaging to course through the usage of message that grants us the unconcealment of the two-fold] > veiled relation (Verhältnis) btwn message & messenger’s course plays (spielt) everywhere [play of the trace]
HDG.DL.linkedContent: are we not attempting the impossible (Unmögliche)? Allerdings — solange dem Menschen nicht jener Botengang rein gewährt ist , den die Botschaft braucht, die dem Menschen die Entbergung der Zwiefalt zuspricht [basically he says: so long as we have not been given the pure gift of messaging to course through the usage of message that grants us the unconcealment of the two-fold] > veiled relation (Verhältnis) btwn message & messenger’s course plays (spielt) everywhere [play of the trace]

HDG.LP.content: Dieses Scheiden [from the old Geschlecht] ist verborgen geschicklich ent-schieden zum Abschied, der aus der Abgeschiedenheit zugerufen wird [the call of apartness] > the wandering of apartness [in night]: “unendliche Qual (infinite torment),” i.e. perfect pain, pain come to its fullness > the Einfalt of the converseness that prevails in pain comes to pure play (reine Spiel) only by wandering through ghostly night & parting from the unghostly night [ontic/ontological]
HDG.LP.linkedContent: Dieses Scheiden [from the old Geschlecht] ist verborgen geschicklich ent-schieden zum Abschied, der aus der Abgeschiedenheit zugerufen wird [the call of apartness] > the wandering of apartness [in night]: “unendliche Qual (infinite torment),” i.e. perfect pain, pain come to its fullness > the Einfalt of the converseness that prevails in pain comes to pure play (reine Spiel) only by wandering through ghostly night & parting from the unghostly night [ontic/ontological]

HDG.EC.content: we are used/needed ( as the string sounding the primordial play of the world, the most ancient provenance (Herkunft) > this instrument is aptly (shicklich) taken up/preserved (aufgehoben) im Veroborgenen > is not answer (Antwort), even in word (Wort), the selfsame as Gegenwart ——Gegenwart is related to time, Antwort related to word, so that time & word are more intimately kindred (verschwistert) than we have presaged (ahnen)
HDG.EC.linkedContent: we are used/needed ( as the string sounding the primordial play of the world, the most ancient provenance (Herkunft) > this instrument is aptly (shicklich) taken up/preserved (aufgehoben) im Veroborgenen > is not answer (Antwort), even in word (Wort), the selfsame as Gegenwart ——Gegenwart is related to time, Antwort related to word, so that time & word are more intimately kindred (verschwistert) than we have presaged (ahnen)

HDG.OHF.content: Dasein as the Unterwegs (being-on-the-way) of itself to itself [esoteric/exoteric] > revealed in this kind of being belonging to hermeneutics: the anticipatory leap forward and running in advance (Vorsprung) can/should be undertaken [de facto, de jure] > Vorsprung doesn’t posit (setzen) an end, but gives it free play (freigeben), puts on the way, discloses, holding fast to being-possible
HDG.OHF.linkedContent: Dasein as the Unterwegs (being-on-the-way) of itself to itself [esoteric/exoteric] > revealed in this kind of being belonging to hermeneutics: the anticipatory leap forward and running in advance (Vorsprung) can/should be undertaken [de facto, de jure] > Vorsprung doesn’t posit (setzen) an end, but gives it free play (freigeben), puts on the way, discloses, holding fast to being-possible

HDG.OHF.content: scope (Umkreis) of factical understanding can’t be calculated, worked-out in advance (nicht im vorhinein und nie auszurechnen) > hermeneutics engages itself, brings itself into play (einsetzt)—from there understanding is possible
HDG.OHF.linkedContent: scope (Umkreis) of factical understanding can’t be calculated, worked-out in advance (nicht im vorhinein und nie auszurechnen) > hermeneutics engages itself, brings itself into play (einsetzt)—from there understanding is possible

HDG.OHF.content: to bring mathematics to play as model (Vorbildes) for all scientific disciplines is unphenomenological: meaning of rigor must be drawn from kind of object being questioned & mode of access appropriate to it (angemessenen Zugangsart) [Heidegger beyond Husserl]
HDG.OHF.linkedContent: to bring mathematics to play as model (Vorbildes) for all scientific disciplines is unphenomenological: meaning of rigor must be drawn from kind of object being questioned & mode of access appropriate to it (angemessenen Zugangsart) [Heidegger beyond Husserl]
